alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 04 at 7:50AM CDT until April 04 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KEOKUK...SOUTHWESTERN JOHNSON...NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND SOUTHEASTERN IOWA COUNTIES... At 750 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Talleyrand, or 12 miles west of Washington, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Washington County Fairgrounds around 755 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include West Chester, Wellman, Richmond, Kalona and Amish. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
